1 Introduction The objective of this guide is to serve as a: Reference guide for the new R Analyst; best-practice guidelines for Hakai staff to make reproducible analyses, and use literate programming methods in R-Studio; and a guide to enhance collaborative capacities for ecological analyses within and between Hakai research programs and generally the science community using Git and GitHub.
